sql-mapping.sql-content: SELECT ID, PASSWORD, NAME, AGE, GENDER, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE ID LIKE '%'||[S_ID]||'%' AND NAME LIKE '%'||[S_NAME]||'%' AND AGE LIKE '%'||[S_AGE]||'%' AND GENDER LIKE '%'||[S_GENDER]||'%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%'||[S_EMAIL]||'%' AND PASSWORD LIKE '%'||[S_PASSWORD]||'%' ORDER BY ID
SELECT SN, TITLE, NOTE, EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID) AS EMPKNAME, CREATEDT FROM CLUB_P WHERE SN = [S_SN]
INSERT INTO club_p(SN, TITLE, NOTE, EMPID, CREATEDT, VIEW_CNT) VALUES( GET_SEQ('CSN'), [TITLE], [NOTE], [EMPID], SYSDATE, 0)
UPDATE CLUB_P SET TITLE=[TITLE] ,NOTE=[NOTE] ,CREATEDT=SYSDATE ,VIEW_CNT=VIEW_CNT+1 WHERE SN = [S_SN]

SELECT A.CLUB_SN, A.CLUB_NM, DECODE(M.EMPID,NULL,'N','Y') AS G_YN FROM CLUB A, (SELECT * FROM CLUB_MEMBER M WHERE M.EMPID = [EMPID]) M WHERE A.CLUB_NM LIKE '%'||[CLUB_NM]||'%' AND A.CLUB_SN = M.CLUB_SN(+)
SELECT CLUB_NM, TO_EMPKNAME(CREMPID) AS CREMPID, CLUB_AD FROM CLUB WHERE CLUB_NM LIKE '%'||[CLUB_NM]||'%'
SELECT C.CLUB_SN AS CLUB_SN, TO_EMPKNAME(M.EMPID) AS ENAME, M.EMPID AS EMPID FROM CLUB C, CLUB_MEMBER M WHERE C.CLUB_SN=M.CLUB_SN AND C.CLUB_SN LIKE '%'||[CLUB_SN]||'%'
SELECT C.CLUB_SN AS CLUB_SN, TO_EMPIMG(M.EMPID) EMPIMG, M.EMPID AS EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME(M.EMPID) AS EMPNM FROM CLUB C, CLUB_MEMBER M WHERE C.CLUB_SN = M.CLUB_SN AND M.CLUB_SN LIKE '%'||[CLUB_SN]||'%'
